channel.title: Port problem
channel.description:
Hey guys , my name is Dmitri and i have some problems with getting server online .
I did port forward for 43594 port , added exceptions in firewall in both sections for both protocol's (TCP AD UDP ) and in port forward did for both protocol's . I managed to check if port's are opened , i turn on the server and used 3-4 port checking tool and they gave me connection timed-out and can't connect . I sed WOW how can it be ? i was using windows xp 3 months ago and i was running my servers perfect , they were online now im using windows 7 home premium I need a help with this , please leave a comment here or add me on skype .
Skype : wiggypk

item.title: Port problem
item.dc:creator: @di544 di544
item.description:
@di544 wrote:

Okay , but i know that IPv4 is changing so i did a static ip and i use the IPv4 in port forward .

Read full topic

item.title: Port problem
item.dc:creator: @eliasjuh12 eliasjuh12
item.description:
@eliasjuh12 wrote:

oke lets start with this fact
ure cmd.exe (look there for ure IPv4)
oke, u did that and it was open.
cmd.exe isn’t always keeping the same ip as IPV4,
i had to change it a couple of times a week when i wanted to host. so start with that
look into ure cmd for the ip to portforward again.

if u got any more trouble i’m willing to add u on skype and help u with it.
regarts: eliasjuh12

Read full topic
